info.description: Allows sellers to: 1) Load products definitions to the BrandLovers marktplace. 2) Receive and update orders status. 3) Receive and update shipping information. 4) Receive and update customer tickets. All requests consume and return application/json content. All request must be authenticated and use HTTPS.
info.title: BrandLovers Marketplace API V1

tags.name: products

get.description: Returns all details of a single order, including last status, items shipped or not.

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: Unique Id of this order.
parameters.name: orderId

approvedAt.description: Date that this order was approved for fullfilment

address.description: Address first line (ave, street name, etc..)

complement.description: Complementary info (aptartament number, building name, suite)

countryId.description: Contry code using aplpha ISO-3166, Example: BR, US, AR, GB, CN

createdAt.description: Date that this order was created

email.description: Customer Email (when available). Please note: Email is not a mandatory field

type.description: Phone number type, home, office, mobile, etc

chargedAmount.description: Shipment cost. Must be informed in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. Same as $1,2345.67 must be informed solely as 1234567

crossDockingTime.description: Time it will take to manufacture, prepare or setup this product. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

transitTime.description: Deliver time in seconds. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

chargedAmount.description: Shipment cost. Must be informed in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. Same as $1,2345.67 must be informed solely as 1234567

crossDockingTime.description: Time it will take to manufacture, prepare or setup this product. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

transitTime.description: Deliver time in seconds. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

available.description: Defines if giftwrpping is available for this product.

messageSupport.description: Defines if giftwrpping is available for this product.

value.description: Amount charged for gift wrap. All prices must be provided in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

amount.description: Total discount in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

sent.description: Flag if product was already shipped

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

orderId.description: Unique order Id (related to this seller)

orderMarketplaceId.description: Unique Order Id that will be displayed to the customer. This Id is not the same as `orderId`

id.description: Seller unique Id in the Brand Lovers Marketplace

name.description: Seller name in the Brand Lovers Marketplace

taxID.description: Courier taxId information. For example CNPJ

id.description: Shipment Id associated with this shippment used to group diferent item or items from a single order

put.description: Update a single product information such as name, brand, attribute, dimension, etc. Please note that data from your request will be merged with existing data. This allows you to easliy update only certain fields without the need to re-inform the other unchanged fields. For example in order to update just the field `title` simply send just this field with new information, remaining fields will not be changed. In order to erase an item the field must be informed as its default value, for example in order to erase the `videos` field must be sent as videos:[]. The `skuSellerId` field is always mandatory in the path and in the product json Object.

parameters.name: limit
